apps.name: Quill
apps.description: AI-powered documentary script generator. Creates scripts up to 5 hours long using OpenAI, Claude, or local AI models. Formats documents to seamlessly integrate with other Skrift suite programs.

apps.name: Resonance
apps.description: Advanced voiceover generation tool. Creates high-quality audio narration for documents produced by Quill. Utilizes external services like ElevenLabs or local processing for flexible, efficient voiceover production.

apps.name: Nexus
apps.description: AI-driven video production suite that seamlessly integrates with Quill and Resonance to automate the creation and editing of professional-quality documentaries. Nexus combines AI-powered script generation, voiceover creation, and video editing tools to produce dynamic, polished content.

apps.name: Babel
apps.description: High-accuracy AI-powered translation tool designed for large documents. Babel automatically translates scripts, voiceover text, and other content produced within the Skrift suite into multiple languages while preserving context, tone, and formatting. Supports both cloud-based and local processing to deliver fast, reliable translations for global audiences.
